<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Unify version metadata.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// \\return true if changes are made.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Assume the named metadata has operands each of which is a pair of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// integer constant, e.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// !Name = &#123;!n1, !n2&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// !n1 = &#123;i32 1, i32 2&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// !n2 = &#123;i32 2, i32 0&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Keep the largest version as the sole operand if PickFirst is false.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Otherwise pick it from the first value, representing kernel module.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuunifymetadata-cpp-/#a42808949a508a2f6e635b6ae584adcd5"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuunifymetadata-cpp-/#a42808949a508a2f6e635b6ae584adcd5">unifyVersionMD</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PickFirst) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!NamedMD || NamedMD-&gt;getNumOperands() &lt;= 1)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42;MaxMD = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Ver = (VersionMajor &#42; 100) + (VersionMinor &#42; 10);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Ver &gt; MaxVer) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Unify version metadata.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\return true if changes are made.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!NamedMD || NamedMD-&gt;getNumOperands() == 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Metadata &#42;, 4&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a230980cf62b697d22ffdda32f6118e27ab1c94ca2fbc3e78fc30069c8d0f01680">All</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;MD : NamedMD-&gt;operands())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> : MD-&gt;operands())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a230980cf62b697d22ffdda32f6118e27ab1c94ca2fbc3e78fc30069c8d0f01680">All</a>.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.get());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;MD : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a230980cf62b697d22ffdda32f6118e27ab1c94ca2fbc3e78fc30069c8d0f01680">All</a>)</span></CodeLine>
